subject: Horse Racing
Philanthropy
Cruelty to Animals
Malnutrition
lead_paragraph: The Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation has been so slow in paying for the upkeep of horses that scores have wound up neglected, according to interviews and inspection reports.
snippet: The Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation has been so slow in paying for the upkeep of horses that scores have wound up neglected, according to interviews and inspection reports.
